Sentencas: The mechanical behaviours of lanthanum metal oxides LaCoO3 (LCO), LaAlO3 (LAO), LaGaO3 (LGO), and LaFeO3 (LFO) were investigated under uniaxial compression.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)

Sentencas: Ferroelastic domain structures were observed as striped patterns in LCO, LAO, and LGO, but not in LFO.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)

Sentencas: Rhombohedral LCO displayed a higher critical stress and larger hysteresis in its stress-strain curve than rhombohedral LAO, which could be attributed to the larger rhombohedral angle of LCO than that of LAO.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)

Sentencas: Orthorhombic LFO-B (sintered at 1673 K) exhibited a larger hysteresis and stronger back-switching behaviour than orthorhombic LGO possibly because of the larger orthorhombic strain of LFO-B, whereas LFO-R (sintered at 1473 K) showed elastic behaviour.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)

Sentencas: Comparison revealed that the rhombohedral ferroelastic materials exhibit smaller stress range for domain switching, resulting in more distinct ferroelastic mechanical behaviour, than the orthorhombic ones.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)

Sentencas: This was confirmed by comparing the mechanical properties of LGO below and above its orthorhombic-to-rhombohedral phase transition temperature.
Titulo: Mechanical behaviour of ferroelastic lanthanum metal oxides LaMO3 (M = Co, Al, Ga, Fe)
